item.title: Data analysis and visualisation in Python
item.description:
Description

This talk will be directed to people interested in doing data analysis and data visualization using python libraries.

I will show some examples of data analysis I performed to compare different data sources using pandas library and ipython notebook.

I will then show how to create beautiful interactive data visualizations using python bokeh library
